data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Federal Capital Territory. Through your servants plant 281 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria

data.prayer: Father, help the 362,013 believers in Federal Capital Territory to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Federal Capital Territory you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Koro Nulu people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Koro Nulu people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Koro Nulu people is yours.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Federal Capital Territory.
Spirit, fill the 1,405,200 souls living in the state of Federal Capital Territory with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.section_summary:
the state of Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria has a population of 1,405,200.

We estimate Federal Capital Territory has 362,013 people who might know Jesus, 357,587 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 685,600 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Federal Capital Territory, Nigeria.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
